summary: A Japanese assassin stranded in Taiwan must take work from a local crime boss to make ends meet when suddenly a woman from his past delivers a son to him.
cast: Show Aikawa|Li-Wei Chang|Shih Chang|Xianmei Chen|Billy Sau Yat Ching|Jianqin He|Ming-chun Kao|Blackie Shou Liang Ko|Li-Chun Lee|Doze Niu|Tomorô Taguchi|Vicky Wei
keywords: part of trilogy|second part|second part of trilogy|taipei taiwan|crime boss
title: Gokudô kuroshakai
